remarks.format:
## Remarks 本節內容：In this section: - [我呼叫的方法？Which method do I call?](#Tasks) - [要剖析的字串The string to parse](#StringToParse) - [剖析和文化特性的慣例Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture) - [剖析和樣式項目Parsing and style elements](#Styles) - [傳回值和 DateTime.KindThe return value and DateTime.Kind](#kind) ### 我呼叫的方法？Which method do I call? |以To|CallCall| |--------|----------| |使用目前文化特性的慣例來剖析日期和時間的字串。Parse a date and time string by using the conventions of the current culture.| 多載 overload| |使用特定文化特性的慣例，以剖析日期和時間的字串。Parse a date and time string by using the conventions of a specific culture.| 多載 (請參閱[剖析和文化習俗](#Culture)) overload (see [Parsing and Cultural Conventions](#Culture))| |剖析日期和時間的字串使用特殊的樣式項目 （例如空白字元或不含空白）。Parse a date and time string with special style elements (such as white space or no white space).| 多載 overload| |剖析日期和時間的字串必須以特定格式。Parse a date and time string that must be in a particular format.| 或 or | |剖析日期和時間的字串，並執行轉換為 UTC 或本地時間。Parse a date and time string and perform a conversion to UTC or local time.| 多載 overload| |剖析日期和時間的字串，而不需要處理的例外狀況。Parse a date and time string without handling exceptions.| 方法 method| |還原執行格式化作業 （來回） 建立的日期和時間值。Restore (round-trip) a date and time value created by a formatting operation.|傳遞的"o"或"r"標準格式字串方法，並呼叫多載 Pass the "o" or "r" standard format string to the method, and call the overload with | |剖析固定格式的日期和時間字串跨電腦 （和可能的文化特性） 的界限。Parse a date and time string in a fixed format across machine (and possibly cultural) boundaries.| 或方法 or method| ### 要剖析的字串The string to parse 方法會嘗試將日期和時間值的字串表示轉換成其相等。The method tries to convert the string representation of a date and time value to its equivalent. 它會嘗試將輸入的字串完全剖析而不擲回例外狀況。It tries to parse the input string completely without throwing a exception. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果剖析作業失敗，因為無法辨識的字串格式，所以方法會擲回，而方法會傳回`false`。If the parsing operation fails because of an unrecognized string format, the method throws a , whereas the method returns `false`. 因為例外狀況處理可能很耗費資源，您應該使用當預期在剖析作業成功，因為輸入的來源是受信任。Because exception handling can be expensive, you should use when the parsing operation is expected to succeed because the input source is trusted. 當剖析失敗有可能，特別是因為輸入的來源不受信任，或您有合理的預設值來取代未成功剖析的字串，則會是偏好。 is preferable when parsing failures are likely, particularly because an input source is not trusted, or you have reasonable default values to substitute for strings that do not parse successfully. 要剖析的字串可以採用任何下列形式：The string to be parsed can take any of the following forms: - 含有日期和時間元件的字串。A string with a date and a time component. - 含日期，但沒有時間部分的字串。A string with a date but no time component. 如果時間元件不存在，則方法會假設午夜 12:00。If the time component is absent, the method assumes 12:00 midnight. 如果日期元件有兩位數年份，則會轉換成根據年份目前的文化特性的現行曆法或指定的文化特性的現行曆法的 (如果您使用多載具有非 null`provider`引數)。If the date component has a two-digit year, it is converted to a year based on the of the current culture's current calendar or the specified culture's current calendar (if you use an overload with a non-null `provider` argument). - 字串，包含只月份和年份的日期元件，但沒有日元件。A string with a date component that includes only the month and the year but no day component. 此方法會假設每月的第一天。The method assumes the first day of the month. - 字串，包含每月和日的日期元件，但沒有年元件。A string with a date component that includes only the month and the day but no year component. 此方法會假設目前的年份。The method assumes the current year. - 包含時間但不含日期項目的字串。A string with a time but no date component. 此方法假設目前的日期，除非您呼叫多載，並包含在`styles`引數，在其中案例的方法會假設年 1 月 1 日的日期以 0001。The method assumes the current date unless you call the overload and include in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001. - 字串，具有時間元件，其中包含在一小時和 AM/PM 指示項，與任何日期元件。A string with a time component that includes only the hour and an AM/PM designator, with no date component. 此方法會假設目前的日期和時間與沒有分鐘和不含秒數。The method assumes the current date and a time with no minutes and no seconds. 您可以變更此行為，藉由呼叫多載，並包含在`styles`引數，在其中案例的方法會假設年 1 月 1 日的日期以 0001。You can change this behavior by calling the overload and include in the `styles` argument, in which case the method assumes a date of January 1, 0001. - 字串，包含時區資訊，並符合 ISO 8601 標準。A string that includes time zone information and conforms to ISO 8601. 在下列範例中，第一個字串將指定 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 和第二個指定的時間相差七個小時的時區中早於 UTC:In the following examples, the first string designates Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), and the second designates the time in a time zone that's seven hours earlier than UTC: 「 2008年-11-01T19:35:00.0000000Z""2008-11-01T19:35:00.0000000Z" 「 2008年-11-01T19:35:00.0000000-07:00""2008-11-01T19:35:00.0000000-07:00" - 字串，包含 GMT 指示項，並符合 RFC 1123 時間格式;例如：A string that includes the GMT designator and conforms to the RFC 1123 time format; for example: 「 2008 年 11 月 01 日，星期六格林威治時間 19:35:00""Sat, 01 Nov 2008 19:35:00 GMT" - 字串，其中包含的日期和時間的時區位移的資訊; 以及例如：A string that includes the date and time along with time zone offset information; for example: "03/01/2009 utc+05:00: 42-5:00""03/01/2009 05:42:00 -5:00" 下列範例會使用目前的文化特性，在此案例中是 EN-US 文化特性的格式化慣例來剖析中每種格式的字串：The following example parses strings in each of these formats by using the formatting conventions of the current culture, which in this case is the en-US culture: [!code-csharp-interactive[Default parsing](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/cs/Parse6.cs)] [!code-vb[Default parsing](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/vb/Parse6.vb)] 如果輸入的字串代表閏年中為閏日，在使用之曆法所剖析的方法 (請參閱[剖析和文化特性的慣例](#Culture))，則方法已成功剖析字串。If the input string represents a leap day in a leap year in the calendar used by the parsing method (see [Parsing and cultural conventions](#Culture)), the method parses the string successfully. 如果輸入的字串代表為閏日在非為閏年，則方法會擲回。If the input string represents a leap day in a non-leap year, the method throws a . 因為方法會嘗試剖析日期字串表示，並使用目前或指定的文化特性，嘗試將字串剖析跨不同的文化特性的格式化規則的時間可能會失敗。Because the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using the formatting rules of the current or a specified culture, trying to parse a string across different cultures can fail. 若要剖析的特定日期和時間格式，在不同的地區設定，使用其中一個多載方法，並提供格式規範。To parse a specific date and time format across different locales, use one of the overloads of the method and provide a format specifier. ### 剖析和文化特性的慣例Parsing and cultural conventions 所有多載方法會區分文化特性除非要剖析的字串 (表示`s`下表) 符合 ISO 8601 模式。All overloads of the method are culture-sensitive unless the string to be parsed (which is represented by `s` in the following table) conforms to the ISO 8601 pattern. 剖析作業所使用的格式設定資訊中物件衍生，如下所示：The parsing operation uses the formatting information in a object that is derived as follows: [!INCLUDE[japanese-era-note](~/includes/calendar-era.md)] |如果您呼叫If you call|和`provider`是And `provider` is|格式設定資訊衍生自Formatting information is derived from| |-----------------|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------| ||-|目前執行緒文化特性 (屬性)The current thread culture ( property)| | 或 or |A物件a object|指定物件The specified object| | 或 or |`null`|目前執行緒文化特性 (屬性)The current thread culture ( property)| | 或 or |A物件a object| 屬性The property| | 或 or |自訂實作Custom implementation| 方法The method| 當格式化資訊衍生自物件，屬性會定義剖析作業中所使用的行事曆。When formatting information is derived from a object, the property defines the calendar used in the parsing operation. 如果您使用來剖析日期和時間字串物件以自訂不同於標準的文化特性的設定，請使用方法，而非方法，以提升成功轉換的機率。If you parse a date and time string by using a object with customized settings that are different from those of a standard culture, use the method instead of the method to improve the chances for a successful conversion. 非標準日期和時間字串可以是複雜且很難剖析。A non-standard date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse. 方法會嘗試剖析的字串與數個隱含的剖析模式，其中都可能會失敗。The method tries to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail. 相反地，方法需要您明確地指定一或多個實際的剖析模式可能會成功。In contrast, the method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < DateTimeFormatInfo 和動態資料 > 一節主題。For more information, see the "DateTimeFormatInfo and Dynamic Data" section in the topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請注意特定文化特性的格式化慣例是動態的而且可能會受到變更影響。Note that the formatting conventions for a particular culture are dynamic and can be subject to change. 這表示，依賴預設值 （目前） 的文化特性或格式設定慣例的剖析作業指定代表文化特性而異的文化特性以外的物件可能會發生下列任一項非預期地失敗：This means that parsing operations that depend on the formatting conventions of the default (current) culture or that specify an object that represents a culture other than the invariant culture can unexpectedly fail if any of the following occurs: > > - .NET Framework 的或現有的.NET framework 版本的更新結果的主要或次要版本之間已經變更的特定文化特性的資料。The culture-specific data has changed between major or minor versions of the .NET Framework or as the result of an update to the existing version of the .NET Framework. > - 特定文化特性的資料會反映使用者喜好設定，電腦或工作階段而有所不同。The culture-specific data reflects user preferences, which can vary from machine to machine or session to session. > - 特定文化特性的資料代表取代的文化特性來覆寫標準文化特性或自訂的文化特性的設定。The culture-specific data represents a replacement culture that overrides the settings of a standard culture or a custom culture. > > 若要避免在剖析日期和時間的字串與文化特性的資料變更相關聯的問題，您就可以使用文化特性而異，來剖析日期和時間字串，或您可以呼叫或方法並指定確切的格式要剖析的字串。To prevent the difficulties in parsing data and time strings that are associated with changes in cultural data, you can parse date and time strings by using the invariant culture, or you can call the or method and specify the exact format of the string to be parsed. 如果您要序列化和還原序列化日期和時間資料，您可以使用的格式化慣例的文化特性而異，或您可以序列化和還原序列化以二進位格式的值。If you are serializing and deserializing date and time data, you can either use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture, or you can serialize and deserialize the value in a binary format. > > 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 動態的文化特性資料 」 一節主題和 「 持續性的 DateTime 值 」 一節中主題。For more information see the "Dynamic culture data" section in the topic and the "Persisting DateTime values" section in the topic. ### 剖析和樣式項目Parsing and style elements 所有多載略過前置、 內部或尾端空格字元，輸入字串中的 (表示`s`下表中)。All overloads ignore leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in the input string (which is represented by `s` in the following table). 日期和時間可以是一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （"#"，U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ("#", U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 颾魤 ㄛ多載具有`styles`參數所組成的一或多個成員列舉型別。In addition, the overload has a `styles` parameter that consists of one or more members of the enumeration. 此參數會定義如何`s`應解譯和剖析作業應該如何將轉換`s`日期和時間。This parameter defines how `s` should be interpreted and how the parse operation should convert `s` to a date and time. 下表描述每個效果在剖析作業的成員。The following table describes the effect of each member on the parse operation. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|在轉換的效果Effect on conversion| |---------------------------|--------------------------| ||剖析`s`而且，如果有需要，將它轉換成 UTC，，如下所示：Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC, as follows:

-如果`s`包含時區時差，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，這個方法會剖析字串，呼叫轉換傳回值UTC，並設定屬性設。- If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to .
-如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。- If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to .
-在所有其他的情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。- In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||這個值會被忽略。This value is ignored. 內部空白字元一律允許的日期和時間項目中`s`。Inner white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||這個值會被忽略。This value is ignored. 中的日期和時間項目一律允許前置空白字元`s`。Leading white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||這個值會被忽略。This value is ignored. 中的日期和時間項目一律允許尾端泛空白字元`s`。Trailing white space is always permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior. 它不能覆寫透過提供更具限制性列舉值，例如。It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive enumeration value such as .| ||指定當`s`缺少會假設任何時區資訊時，本地時間。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, local time is assumed. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少會假設任何時區資訊，UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, UTC is assumed. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored.| ||針對包含時區資訊的字串，會嘗試防止日期和時間字串轉換成值，表示本地時間，和其屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a value that represents a local time with its property set to . 一般而言，這類字串由呼叫方法並使用"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範。Typically, such a string is created by calling the method and by using the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifier.| ### 傳回值和 DateTime.KindThe return value and DateTime.Kind `DateTime.Parse`多載會傳回值屬性包含時區資訊。The `DateTime.Parse` overloads return a value whose property includes time zone information. 它可能表示，時間：It can indicate that the time is: - 國際標準時間 ()。Coordinated Universal Time (). - 在當地時區的時間 ()。The time in the local time zone (). - 未知的時區時間 (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName >)。The time in an unknown time zone (xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=fullName>). 一般而言，方法會傳回物件，其屬性是。Generally, the method returns a object whose property is . 不過，方法也可能會在執行時區轉換，並將值屬性以不同的方式，根據的值`s`和`styles`參數：However, the method may also perform time zone conversion and set the value of the property differently, depending on the values of the `s` and `styles` parameters: |如果If|時區轉換Time zone conversion|類型屬性Kind property| |--------|--------------------------|-------------------| |`s` 包含時區資訊。`s` contains time zone information.|日期和時間是以當地時區轉換為的時間。The date and time is converted to the time in the local time zone.|| |`s` 包含時區資訊，以及`styles`包含旗標。`s` contains time zone information, and `styles` includes the flag.|日期和時間會轉換為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。The date and time is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).|| |`s` 包含 Z 或 GMT 的時區指示項，並`styles`包含旗標。`s` contains the Z or GMT time zone designator, and `styles` includes the flag.|日期和時間視為 UTC。The date and time are interpreted as UTC.|| 下列範例會將日期字串，包含以當地時區的時區資訊的時間：The following example converts date strings that contain time zone information to the time in the local time zone: [!code-csharp-interactive[System.DateTime.Parse#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/cs/Parse2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Parse#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/vb/Parse2.vb#2)] 您也可以保留的日期和時間的值屬性的格式設定和使用剖析作業期間旗標。You can also preserve the value of a date and time's property during a formatting and parsing operation by using the flag. 下列範例說明如何旗標會影響剖析的作業上使用"o"、"r"或"u"格式規範會轉換為字串的值。The following example illustrates how the flag affects the parsing operation on values that are converted to strings by using the "o", "r", or "u" format specifier. [!code-csharp-interactive[System.DateTime.Parse#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/cs/Parse5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Parse#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Parse/vb/Parse5.vb#5)] ### Examples 呼叫的數個範例`DateTime.Parse`方法散佈整個[備註](#remarks)這篇文章，並在個別的文件中的區段`DateTime.Parse`多載。Numerous examples that call the `DateTime.Parse` method are interspersed throughout the [Remarks](#remarks) section of this article and in the documentation for the individual `DateTime.Parse` overloads. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`s`包含時區資訊，這個方法會傳回值屬性是，並將轉換的日期和時間在`s`為當地時間。If `s` contains time zone information, this method returns a value whose property is and converts the date and time in `s` to local time. 否則，它會執行任何時區轉換，並傳回值屬性是。Otherwise, it performs no time zone conversion and returns a value whose property is . 這個多載會嘗試剖析`s`使用目前文化特性的格式化慣例。This overload attempts to parse `s` by using the formatting conventions of the current culture. 目前的文化特性會由屬性。The current culture is indicated by the property. 若要使用之特定文化特性的格式化慣例將字串剖析，呼叫或多載。To parse a string using the formatting conventions of a specific culture, call the or the overloads. 這個多載會嘗試剖析`s`使用樣式。This overload attempts to parse `s` by using style. ## 範例Example 下列範例會剖析由數個日期和時間值的字串表示法：The following example parses the string representation of several date and time values by: - 使用預設的格式提供者，提供用來產生輸出範例中的電腦的目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例。Using the default format provider, which provides the formatting conventions of hte current thread culture of the computer used to produce the example output. 此範例的輸出會反映 EN-US 文化特性的格式化慣例。The output from this example reflects the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. - 使用預設樣式值，亦即。Using the default style value, which is . 它會處理當方法嘗試使用其他文化特性剖析的日期和時間的字串表示時，會擲回的例外狀況的格式化慣例。It handles the exception that is thrown when the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time by using some other culture's formatting conventions. 它也會示範如何成功地剖析日期和時間值，不會使用目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例。It also shows how to successfully parse a date and time value that does not use the formatting conventions of the current thread culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析所定義的格式必須是日期的字串表示`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 它也需要\<日期 > 和\<時間 > 日期和時間的字串表示的項目會出現在所指定的順序`format`，且`s`不有非允許的任何空白字元`format`.It also requires that the \ and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`, and that `s` have no white space other than that permitted by `format`. 如果`format`定義日期使用任何時間元素，而剖析作業成功時，所產生的值具有午夜的時間 (00: 00:00)。If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value has a time of midnight (00:00:00). 如果`format`所定義的時間沒有任何日期項目和剖析作業成功時，產生值具有日期`DateTime.Now.Date`。If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`. 如果`s`不的代表時間以特定的時區和剖析作業成功時，屬性傳回的的值是。If `s` does not represent a time in a particular time zone and the parse operation succeeds, the property of the returned value is . 如果`s`確實代表特定時區的時間和`format`可讓要有的時區資訊 (例如，如果`format`等於"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範，或如果它包含"z"、"zz"或"zzz"自訂格式規範），屬性傳回之值是。If `s` does represent the time in a particular time zone and `format` allows time zone information to be present (for example, if `format` is equal to the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers, or if it contains the "z", "zz", or "zzz" custom format specifiers), the property of the returned value is . `format`參數是包含單一標準格式規範或一或多個自訂格式規範會定義所需的格式字串`s`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `s`. 如需有效的格式化程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)或是[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) or [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果`format`是不包含日期或時間的分隔符號 （例如 「 yyyyMMddHHmm")，使用的文化特性而異的自訂格式模式`provider`參數和廣泛形式的每個自訂格式規範。If `format` is a custom format pattern that does not include date or time separators (such as "yyyyMMddHHmm"), use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要的格式模式中指定的時數，指定更多表單中，"HH"，而非較窄的表單，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the format pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". 特定日期和時間的符號和字串 （例如在特定的語言中一周天數名稱） 中使用`s`所定義`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式指定名稱的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示用來解譯的文化特性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 所傳回的物件及其屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂實作其方法會傳回物件或提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析中所定義的格式必須是日期的字串表示`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter. 它也要求中的日期和時間元素`s`出現在所指定的順序`format`。It also requires that the date and time elements in `s` appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`s`不符合的模式`format`參數，所定義的任何變化`style`參數，此方法會擲回。If `s` does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `style` parameter, the method throws a . 相反地，方法會剖析任何一種格式提供者所辨識的格式的日期的字串表示物件。In contrast, the method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's object. 方法也可讓日期和時間的項目中`s`依任何順序出現。The method also allows the date and time elements in `s` to appear in any order. 如果`s`參數會包含只有一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期是除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數會包含只有日期任何時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置字元、 內部或結尾的空白字元。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 使用也可以變更此行為旗標，就會傳回值屬性是，或使用並旗標，以傳回值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果`s`包含時區資訊的時間會轉換為當地時間，如有必要，和屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 使用也可以變更此行為旗標不轉換為當地時間的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，並設定屬性設。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and to set the property to . `format`參數會定義所需的模式`s`參數。The `format` parameter defines the required pattern of the `s` parameter. 也可以包含從一或多個自訂格式規範[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或單一標準格式規範，它會識別預先定義的模式中，從[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。It can consist of either one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您不使用日期或時間分隔符號的自訂格式模式中，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和廣泛形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要在模式中指定的時數，指定更多表單中，"HH"，而非較窄的表單，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". > [!NOTE] > 不需要可`s`符合單一格式的剖析作業成功，您可以呼叫方法並指定多個允許的格式。Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the method and specify multiple permitted formats. 這可讓剖析作業更容易成功。This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed. `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員列舉型別，判斷是否與其中所未定義泛空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制的剖析作業精確的行為。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述每個方式的成員列舉型別會影響營運方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||剖析`s`而且，如果有需要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含時區時差，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，這個方法會剖析字串，呼叫轉換傳回值為 UTC並設定屬性設。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`任何個別的日期或時間項目之間可以出現。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在開頭`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在結尾`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端未定義的泛空白字元`format`。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表當地時間。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含時間的日期，傳回的值設定為不含日期資訊`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`會剖析參數，使用預設值。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 非出示中沒有空白字元`format`允許。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，值設為 1/1/0001。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 時區資訊是否存在於`s`，時間會轉換為當地時間與屬性傳回的物件設定為。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| ||針對包含時區資訊的字串，會嘗試防止轉換成值的日期和時間使用其屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a value date and time with its property set to . 主要，此旗標可避免 UTC 時間的轉換為本地時間。This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| 特定日期和時間的符號和中使用的字串 （例如在特定的語言中一周天數名稱）`s`所定義`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式指定名稱的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示用來解譯的文化特性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 所傳回的物件及其屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂實作其方法會傳回物件或提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 請注意，字串"2009 年 5 月 01 日上午 8:30"無法成功剖析時`styles`參數等於因為所不允許有前置空格`format`。Note that the string " 5/01/2009 8:30 AM" cannot be parsed successfully when the `styles` parameter equals because leading spaces are not allowed by `format`. 此外，字串"2009 年 5 月 01 日 09:00"無法以成功地剖析`format`的"MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm"因為日期字串前面沒有前置的零，月份數字為`format`需要。Additionally, the string "5/01/2009 09:00" cannot be parsed successfully with a `format` of "MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm" because the date string does not precede the month number with a leading zero, as `format` requires. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析的日期字串表示符合任何一個模式指派給`formats`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果字串`s`不符合任一這些模式的變化所定義的任何`styles`參數，此方法會擲回。If the string `s` does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比較`s`到多個格式模式，而非單一的格式模式中，這個多載的行為相同方法。Aside from comparing `s` to multiple formatting patterns, rather than to a single formatting pattern, this overload behaves identically to the method. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`參數會包含只有一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期是除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數會包含只有日期任何時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置字元、 內部或結尾的空白字元以外的其中一個格式字串中允許的字元`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 使用也可以變更此行為旗標，就會傳回值屬性是，或使用並旗標，以傳回值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如果`s`包含時區資訊的時間會轉換為當地時間，如有必要，和屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 使用也可以變更此行為無法轉換為當地時間的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，並設定的旗標屬性設。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`參數包含陣列的模式，其中`s`必須完全符合剖析作業會成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. 中的模式`formats`參數是由從一或多個自訂格式規範所組成[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或從識別為預先定義的模式，單一標準格式規範[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。The patterns in the `formats` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您不使用日期或時間分隔符號的自訂格式模式中，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和廣泛形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要在模式中指定的時數，指定更多表單中，"HH"，而非較窄的表單，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員列舉型別，判斷是否與其中所未定義泛空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制的剖析作業精確的行為。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述每個方式的成員列舉型別會影響營運方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含時間的日期，傳回的值設定為不含日期資訊`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`會剖析參數，使用預設值。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 非出示中沒有空白字元`format`允許。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，值設為 1/1/0001。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 時區資訊是否存在於`s`，時間會轉換為當地時間與屬性傳回的物件設定為。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| ||針對包含時區資訊的字串，會嘗試將無法轉換成日期和時間使用其屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a date and time with its property set to . 主要，此旗標可避免 UTC 時間的轉換為本地時間。This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| 特定日期和時間的符號和中使用的字串 （例如在特定的語言中一周天數名稱）`s`所定義`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式指定名稱的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示用來解譯的文化特性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 所傳回的物件及其屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂實作其方法會傳回物件或提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以確保可成功剖析在幾個可能的格式的字串。The following example uses the method to ensure that a string in a number of possible formats can be successfully parsed . span.span: Creates a new object that has the same number of ticks as the specified , but is designated as either local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, as indicated by the specified value.

returns.span: 新物件，這個物件的刻度數與 參數代表的物件相同，且具有 參數指定的 值。

span.span: A new object that has the same number of ticks as the object represented by the parameter and the value specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件包含的類型 欄位，指出是否將時間值根據本地時間或國際標準時間 (UTC)，或是兩者皆否，而且包含時間值的刻度欄位以 100 奈秒刻度為單位。A object consists of a Kind field that indicates whether the time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a Ticks field that contains a time value measured in 100-nanosecond ticks. 方法建立新物件使用指定`kind`參數與原始的時間值。The method creates a new object using the specified `kind` parameter and the original time value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳回該值不代表相同立即時間`value`參數，和不是時區轉換方法。The returned value does not represent the same instant in time as the `value` parameter, and is not a time zone conversion method. 相反地，將會使指定的時間`value`參數保持不變，且會設定屬性設`kind`。Instead, it leaves the time specified by the `value` parameter unchanged, and sets the property to `kind`. 如需時區轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 各時區間轉換時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md)。For information about time zone conversions, see [Converting Times Between Time Zones](~/docs/standard/datetime/converting-between-time-zones.md). 方法會很有用，您在何處接收的互通性案例中物件未指定的類型欄位，但您可以判斷獨立表示刻度欄位代表當地時間或 UTC。The method is useful in interoperability scenarios where you receive a object with an unspecified Kind field, but you can determine by independent means that the Ticks field represents local time or UTC. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷兩個日期之間的差異。The method determines the difference between two dates. 要減去的時間間隔，從目前的執行個體，呼叫方法。To subtract a time interval from the current instance, call the method. 要減去的特定時間間隔內，從目前的執行個體，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供做為方法引數為負數值。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要減少從目前日期的兩個月，呼叫-2 值的方法。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 如果目前的執行個體的時間與日期是早於`value`，則方法會傳回物件，表示負的時間範圍。If the date and time of the current instance is earlier than `value`, the method returns a object that represents a negative time span. 也就是其所有非零屬性的值 (例如或) 為負數。That is, the value of all of its non-zero properties (such as or ) is negative. 方法不會考慮值兩個屬性值時執行減法運算。The method does not consider the value of the property of the two values when performing the subtraction. 再減去物件，請確定物件是否代表相同的時區中的時間。Before subtracting objects, ensure that the objects represent times in the same time zone. 否則，結果將包含時間的時區之間的差異。Otherwise, the result will include the difference between time zones. > [!NOTE] > 方法會考量執行減法運算時的時區之間的差異。The method does consider the difference between time zones when performing the subtraction. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法和減法運算子。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回指定的時間間隔的差異，從目前的執行個體的日期。The method returns the date that is a specified time interval difference from the current instance. 若要判斷兩個日期之間的時間間隔，請呼叫方法。To determine the time interval between two dates, call the method. 要減去的特定時間間隔內，從目前的執行個體，呼叫的方法，將該時間間隔加入至目前的日期，並提供做為方法引數為負數值。To subtract a particular time interval from the current instance, call the method that adds that time interval to the current date, and supply a negative value as the method argument. 例如，若要減少從目前日期的兩個月，呼叫-2 值的方法。For example, to subtract two months from the current date, call the method with a value of -2. 這個方法不會變更這個值。This method does not change the value of this . 相反地，它會傳回新其值是這項作業的結果。Instead, it returns a new whose value is the result of this operation. 一般情況下，方法會減去物件，表示正的時間範圍，並傳回早於目前的執行個體的時間與日期的值。Ordinarily, the method subtracts a object that represents a positive time span and returns a value that is earlier than the date and time of the current instance. 不過，如果物件所表示的負的時間範圍內，方法會傳回晚的日期和時間之目前執行個體的值。However, if the object represents a negative time span, the method returns a value that is later than the date and time of the current instance. 方法可讓您減少包含多個時間單位的指定的分鐘數 （指定數字的時數） 等的時間間隔。The method allows you to subtract a time interval that consists of more than one unit of time (such as a given number of hours and a given number of minutes). 要從中減去的時間 （例如年、 月或日） 的單一單位執行個體，您可以傳遞負數的數字值做為參數以下列方法之一：To subtract a single unit of time (such as years, months, or days) from the instance, you can pass a negative numeric value as a parameter to any of the following methods: - 要減去特定數目的年份，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。, to subtract a specific number of years from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定數目的幾個月，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。, to subtract a specific number of months from the current date and time instance. - 要扣除的天數，從目前的日期和時間執行個體的特定數目。, to subtract a specific number of days from the current date and time instance. - 要減去的特定時間會從目前的日期和時間執行個體數目。, to subtract a specific number of hours from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定從目前的日期和時間執行個體的分鐘數。, to subtract a specific number of minutes from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定的從目前的日期和時間執行個體的秒數。, to subtract a specific number of seconds from the current date and time instance. - 要在特定的從目前的日期和時間執行個體的毫秒數。, to subtract a specific number of milliseconds from the current date and time instance. - 要減去特定數目的刻度，從目前的日期和時間執行個體。, to subtract a specific number of ticks from the current date and time instance. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法和減法運算子。The following example demonstrates the method and the subtraction operator. summary.span: 取得表示這個執行個體日期和時間的刻度數目。

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 刻度數目，表示這個執行個體的日期和時間。

span.span: The number of ticks that represent the date and time of this instance.

value.span: 值介於 和 之間。

span.span: The value is between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 單一刻度表示 100 奈秒或一的第二個。A single tick represents one hundred nanoseconds or one ten-millionth of a second. 有 10000 刻度毫秒或 10 萬個刻度在 1 秒。There are 10,000 ticks in a millisecond, or 10 million ticks in a second. 這個屬性的值代表 0001 年 1 月 1 日的 12:00:00 午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (0: 00:00 UTC 年 1 月 1 日 0001，西曆中的)，表示。The value of this property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 (0:00:00 UTC on January 1, 0001, in the Gregorian calendar), which represents . 它不包含是能歸因於 leap 秒為單位的刻度的數。It does not include the number of ticks that are attributable to leap seconds. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示開頭二十一世紀以來所經過的刻度數，以及具現化物件。The following example uses the property to display the number of ticks that have elapsed since the beginning of the twenty-first century and to instantiate a object. 物件會被用來顯示使用數個其他時間間隔已耗用時間。The object is then used to display the elapsed time using several other time intervals. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/cs/Ticks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Ticks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Ticks/vb/Ticks.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得這個執行個體的一天時間。

span.span: Gets the time of day for this instance.

value.span: 時間間隔，表示從午夜以來已經過的當天部分。

span.span: A time interval that represents the fraction of the day that has elapsed since midnight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於屬性。Unlike the property. 它會傳回值，表示日期，但時間元件，沒有屬性會傳回值，表示值的時間元件。which returns a value that represents a date without its time component, the property returns a value that represents a value's time component. 如果您想要顯示的時間，或擷取的當日時間的字串表示法值，您可以改為呼叫的多載具有方法`format`參數或使用[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)與"t"或"T"標準格式字串的功能。If you want to display the time of day or retrieve the string representation of the time of day of a value, you can instead call an overload of the method that has a `format` parameter or use the [composite formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) feature with the "t" or "T" standard format string. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的值屬性的陣列值。The following example displays the value of the property for an array of values. 它也會對照所傳回字串"t"標準格式字串，複合格式化作業中的傳回值。It also contrasts the return value with the string returned by the "t" standard format string in a composite formatting operation. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TimeOfDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.timeofday/cs/timeofday1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TimeOfDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.timeofday/vb/timeofday1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public long ToBinary ();
.method public hidebysig instance int64 ToBinary() cil managed
Public Function ToBinary () As Long
public: long ToBinary();
member this.ToBinary : unit -> int64

summary.span: 將目前的 物件序列化成 64 位元的二進位值，之後可以用這個值來重新建立 物件。

span.span: Serializes the current object to a 64-bit binary value that subsequently can be used to recreate the object.

returns.span: 64 位元帶正負號的整數，可以編碼 和 屬性。

span.span: A 64-bit signed integer that encodes the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以將目前值轉換成二進位值的物件。Use the method to convert the value of the current object to a binary value. 接著，使用二進位值和方法來重新建立原始物件。Subsequently, use the binary value and the method to recreate the original object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情況下，所傳回的值方法並不相同原始值提供給方法。In some cases, the value returned by the method is not identical to the original value supplied to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下一步 區段中，「 本地時間調整 」。For more information, see the next section, "Local Time Adjustment". ## 當地時間調整Local Time Adjustment 當地時間，也就是調整為本地時區的國際標準時間，由結構，其屬性具有值。A local time, which is a Coordinated Universal Time adjusted to the local time zone, is represented by a structure whose property has the value . 還原本機時值由所產生的二進位表示法方法，方法可能會調整重新建立的值，如此就不等於原始值。When restoring a local value from the binary representation that is produced by the method, the method may adjust the recreated value so that it is not equal to the original value. 在下列狀況下可能會發生這種情形：This can occur under the following conditions: - 如果當地物件會序列化中的某個時區方法，，然後在不同的時區，藉由還原序列化方法，表示所產生的本機時間物件會自動調整第二個的時區。If a local object is serialized in one time zone by the method, and then deserialized in a different time zone by the method, the local time represented by the resulting object is automatically adjusted to the second time zone. 例如，假設代表當地時間下午 3 點的物件For example, consider a object that represents a local time of 3 P.M. 執行位於美國的應用程式使用太平洋時區方法，以將其轉換二進位值的物件。An application that is executing in the U.S. Pacific Time zone uses the method to convert that object to a binary value. 執行位於美國的另一個應用程式會使用美國東部時區方法，將二進位值轉換到新物件。Another application that is executing in the U.S. Eastern Time zone uses the method to convert the binary value to a new object. 新值物件是下午 6 點，代表相同的點為原始下午 3 點的時間The value of the new object is 6 P.M., which represents the same point in time as the original 3 P.M. 值，但會調整為美國東部時區的當地時間。value, but is adjusted to local time in the Eastern Time zone. - 如果在本機的二進位表示法值表示無效的時間以當地時區的系統上是呼叫，時間會調整，讓它是否有效。If the binary representation of a local value represents an invalid time in the local time zone of the system on which is called, the time is adjusted so that it is valid. 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間會發生在美國太平洋時間區域，在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間前移一個小時，到凌晨 3:00For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M. 這個小時間隔是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone. 下列範例顯示時的時間必須落在此範圍會轉換為二進位值所方法，然後還原成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a binary value by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time. 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受到修改傳遞至方法，為此範例說明。You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/cs/frombinary1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.FromBinary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.datetime.frombinary/vb/frombinary1.vb#1)] ## 版本的考量Version Considerations 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，開始結構包含私用的類型欄位，指出指定的時間值根據本地時間或國際標準時間 (UTC)，或是兩者皆非和私用的 「 刻度 」 欄位，其中包含指定的日期和時間的 100 奈秒刻度數。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, a structure consists of a private Kind field, which indicates whether the specified time value is based on local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, and a private Ticks field, which contains the number of 100-nanosecond ticks that specify a date and time. 可以使用存取刻度欄位屬性和類型的欄位可以使用存取屬性。The Ticks field can be accessed with the property and the Kind field can be accessed with the property. 在.NET Framework 2.0 中，如果您序列化之前物件，以手動方式而非使用序列化介面，例如，您只需要序列化中的刻度資料結構。Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, if you serialized a object manually instead of using a serialization interface such as , you only needed to serialize the Ticks data in the structure. 從 2.0 版開始，您也必須序列化類型的資料。Starting with version 2.0, you must also serialize the Kind data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，傳回值是其屬性會傳回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 因為它會傳回目前的日期，而目前的時間，不屬性是適用於只使用日期的應用程式中使用。Because it returns the current date without the current time, the property is suitable for use in applications that work with dates only. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 選擇 DateTime、 DateTimeOffset、 TimeSpan 和 TimeZoneInfo 之間](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md)。For details, see [Choosing Between DateTime, DateTimeOffset, TimeSpan, and TimeZoneInfo](~/docs/standard/datetime/choosing-between-datetime.md). 相反地，屬性會傳回目前的時間，而不需要目前的日期，而屬性會傳回目前的日期和目前的時間。In contrast, the property returns the current time without the current date, and the property returns both the current date and the current time. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來擷取目前的日期。The following example uses the property to retrieve the current date. 它也說明了如何值可以使用某些標準日期和時間格式字串格式化。It also illustrates how a value can be formatted using some of the standard date and time format strings. 請注意的第三個呼叫所產生的輸出方法使用 g 格式規範，以包含時間元件，也就是零。Note that the output produced by the third call to the method uses the g format specifier to include the time component, which is zero. summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成 Windows 檔案時間。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to a Windows file time.

returns.span: 以 Windows 檔案時間表示的目前 物件的值。

span.span: The value of the current object expressed as a Windows file time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 檔案時間會表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數的 64 位元值A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 會使用檔案的時間，來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法會使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件是當地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的一種會被視為當地時間的時間。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a local time. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToFileTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToFileTime/VB/class1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 產生的檔案時間會代表西元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 之前的日期和時間。

span.span: The resulting file time would represent a date and time before 12:00 midnight January 1, 1601 C.E.
UTC.

para.span: 一般情況下，方法還原所儲存的值方法。

span.span: Ordinarily, the method restores a value that was saved by the method.

para.span: 不過，在下列情況下的兩個值可能與不同：

span.span: However, the two values may differ under the following conditions:

para.span: -如果序列化和還原序列化值偏高，在不同的時區。

span.span: - If the serialization and deserialization of the value occur in different time zones.

para.span: 例如，如果時間為下午 12:30 的值

span.span: For example, if a value with a time of 12:30 P.M.

para.span: 在美國序列化，並再還原序列化在美國東部時區太平洋時間區域，原始的值為下午 12:30

span.span: in the U.S. Eastern Time zone is serialized, and then deserialized in the U.S. Pacific Time zone, the original value of 12:30 P.M.

para.span: 已調整為上午 9:30

span.span: is adjusted to 9:30 A.M.

para.span: 反映兩個時區之間的差異。

span.span: to reflect the difference between the two time zones.

para.span: -如果序列化的值表示無效的時間以當地時區。

span.span: - If the value that is serialized represents an invalid time in the local time zone.

para.span: 在此情況下，方法會調整還原值，使其表示有效的時間以當地時區。

span.span: In this case, the method adjusts the restored value so that it represents a valid time in the local time zone.

para.span: 例如，從標準時間轉換到日光節約時間會發生在美國太平洋時間區域，在 2010 年 3 月 14 日到上午 2:00，時間前移一個小時，到凌晨 3:00

span.span: For example, the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs in the U.S. Pacific Time zone on March 14, 2010, at 2:00 A.M., when the time advances by one hour, to 3:00 A.M.

para.span: 這個小時間隔是無效的時間，也就是不存在於這個時區的時間間隔。

span.span: This hour interval is an invalid time, that is, a time interval that does not exist in this time zone.

para.span: 下列範例會顯示該時的時間必須落在這個範圍會會轉換為長整數值方法，然後還原成為有效的時間會調整的方法，將原始值。

span.span: The following example shows that when a time that falls within this range is converted to a long integer value by the method and is then restored by the method, the original value is adjusted to become a valid time.

para.span: 您可以判斷是否是特定日期和時間值可能會受到修改傳遞至方法，為此範例說明。

span.span: You can determine whether a particular date and time value may be subject to modification by passing it to the method, as the example illustrates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 檔案時間會表示 12:00，年 1 月 1 西元 1601年日午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數的 64 位元值A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 會使用檔案的時間，來記錄應用程式建立、 存取，或寫入檔案時。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. 方法會使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件是當地時間、 UTC 時間或未指定的類型的時間視為 UTC 時間。The method uses the property to determine whether the current object is a local time, a UTC time, or an unspecified kind of time which is treated as a UTC time. 如果是當地時間，它將時間轉換為 UTC 之前執行成 Windows 檔案時間轉換。If it is a local time, it converts the time to UTC before performing the conversion to a Windows file time.

UTC.

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成本地時間。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to local time.

returns.span: 物件，其 屬性為 ，而其值為與目前 物件的值相等的本地時間；如果轉換過的值太大，而無法由 物件表示，則為 ；如果轉換過的值太小，而無法表示為 物件，則為 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the local time equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented as a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地時間等於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時間再加上 UTC 時差。The local time is equal to the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time plus the UTC offset. 如需 UTC 時差的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 轉換也會納入考慮日光節約時間規則套用至目前所表示之時間物件。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法會從 UTC 轉換為當地時間時，會辨識只在目前的調整規則。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from UTC to local time. 如此一來，轉換為目前的調整規則生效之前的期間，可能不會正確反映 UTC 與當地時間之間的差異。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between UTC and local time. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，所傳回的值開始取決於方法屬性與目前物件。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表說明可能的結果。The following table describes the possible results. |類型Kind|結果Results| |----------|-------------| ||這個執行個體轉換為本地時間。This instance of is converted to local time.| ||不會執行轉換。No conversion is performed.| ||這個執行個體假設為 UTC 時間，並執行轉換作業一樣已。This instance of is assumed to be a UTC time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法將為當地時間與 utc 之間的值。The method converts a value from UTC to local time. 若要在任何指定的時區時間轉換為當地時間，使用方法。To convert the time in any designated time zone to local time, use the method. 轉換所傳回的值是其屬性一律會傳回。The value returned by the conversion is a whose property always returns . 有效的結果傳回的結果，即使重複套用至相同。Consequently, a valid result is returned even if is applied repeatedly to the same . ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 請注意，確切的輸出取決於目前的文化特性和執行所在系統的當地時區。Note that the exact output depends on the current culture and the local time zone of the system on which it is run. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的完整日期 (Long Date) 字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent long date string representation.

returns.span: 字串，內含目前 物件的完整日期字串表示。

span.span: A string that contains the long date string representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式使用所定義的模式與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"D"所傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "D" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它會反映目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的長日期模式為"dddd，MMMMdd，yyyy";DE-DE 文化特性，它為"dddd，d。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard long date pattern is "dddd, MMMMdd, yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dddd, d. MMMMyyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性中，則是"yyyy'？ 'M'？ 'd'？ ' 」。MMMMyyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy'?'M'?'d'?'". 使其不同於標準的長日期格式字串，也可以自訂在特定電腦上特定的格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard long date format string. 如需有關目前執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個其所產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToShortLongString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToShortLongString/cs/sls.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToShortLongString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToShortLongString/vb/sls.vb#1)]

returns.span: 雙精確度浮點數，含有等於這個執行個體值的 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to the value of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE Automation 日期會實作為浮點數，其不可或缺的元件是之前或之後午夜，30 1899 年 12 月的天數，而其小數部分代表在除以 24 那一天的時間。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose integral component is the number of days before or after midnight, 30 December 1899, and whose fractional component represents the time on that day divided by 24. 例如，日午夜 31 年 12 月 1899年表示 1.0;上午 6 點 2.25; 表示 1 年 1 月 1900午夜-1.0; 表示 29 的 12 月 1899而且早上 6 點-1.25 表示 29 的 12 月 1899年。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基底 OLE Automation 日期是午夜，30 年 12 月 1899年。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. OLE Automation 日期的下限是 1 年 1 月 0100 年午夜。The minimum OLE Automation date is midnight, 1 January 0100. 最大 OLE Automation 日期等同於、 31 年 12 月的最後一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 方法會擲回如果目前的執行個體代表日期晚於及更早的版本比 0100 January1，在午夜。The method throws an if the current instance represents a date that is later than and earlier than midnight on January1, 0100. 不過，如果目前的執行個體的值為，此方法會傳回 0。However, if the value of the current instance is , the method returns 0. 如需有關 OLE Automation 的詳細資訊，請參閱[MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 這個執行個體的值無法表示為 OLE Automation 日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

.method public hidebysig instance string ToShortDateString() cil managed
Public Function ToShortDateString () As String
public: System::String ^ ToShortDateString();
member this.ToShortDateString : unit -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Security.SecuritySafeCritical

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的簡短日期 (Short Date) 字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent short date string representation.

returns.span: 字串，內含目前 物件的簡短日期字串表示。

span.span: A string that contains the short date string representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式使用所定義的模式與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"d"所傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "d" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它會反映目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短日期模式是"yyyy/m /";DE-DE 文化特性，它會是"dd。MM.yyyy";若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它可以是"yyyy/M/d"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short date pattern is "M/d/yyyy"; for the de-DE culture, it is "dd.MM.yyyy"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "yyyy/M/d". 使其不同於標準的簡短日期格式字串，也可以自訂在特定電腦上特定的格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short date format string. 如需有關目前執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個其所產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 它也會顯示所呼叫的結果方法等同於呼叫使用"d"作為 format 參數的方法。It also shows that the result of calling the method is identical to calling the method with "d" as the format parameter. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/cs/ToShortDateString.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToShortDateString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToShortDateString/vb/ToShortDateString.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式使用所定義的模式與目前執行緒文化特性相關聯的屬性。The value of the current object is formatted using the pattern defined by the property associated with the current thread culture. 傳回值是藉由指定"t"傳回的值相同[標準 DateTime 格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)與方法。The return value is identical to the value returned by specifying the "t" [standard DateTime format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) with the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 所傳回的字串方法會區分文化特性。The string returned by the method is culture-sensitive. 它會反映目前的文化特性所定義的模式物件。It reflects the pattern defined by the current culture's object. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，標準的簡短時間模式是"h:mm tt";DE-DE 文化特性，它為"Hh: mm";若為 JA-JP 文化特性，它是"H:mm"。For example, for the en-US culture, the standard short time pattern is "h:mm tt"; for the de-DE culture, it is "HH:mm"; for the ja-JP culture, it is "H:mm". 使其不同於標準的簡短時間格式字串，也可以自訂在特定電腦上特定的格式字串。The specific format string on a particular computer can also be customized so that it differs from the standard short time format string. 如需有關目前執行緒文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the current thread culture, see the property. 多個其所產生的格式字元、 格式模式和輸出的相關資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)主題。For more information about format characters, format patterns, and the output they produce, see the [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) topic. 如需變更格式字元相關聯的格式模式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about changing the format pattern associated with a format character, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. summary.span: 使用目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of the value of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G')。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'). 若要設定格式使用特定的日期和時間格式規範，請呼叫方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier, call the method. 若要設定它使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G') 的特定文化特性的格式，請呼叫方法。To format it using the general date and time format specifier ('G') for a specific culture, call the method. 若要格式化使用特定的日期和時間格式規範和特定文化特性的慣例，呼叫方法。To format it using a specific date and time format specifier and the conventions of a specific culture, call the method. 這個方法會使用衍生自目前的文化特性格式資訊。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 特別是，它結合了所傳回的自訂格式字串並的屬性所傳回的物件`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat`屬性。In particular, it combines the custom format strings returned by the and properties of the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 其他多載方法可讓您指定的文化特性的格式化，若要使用，並定義輸出的模式值。Other overloads of the method enable you to specify the culture whose formatting to use and to define the output pattern of the value. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何的字串表示法所傳回的值方法取決於目前執行緒的文化特性。The following example illustrates how the string representation of a value returned by the method depends on the thread current culture. 從英文變更目前執行緒文化特性時，它為 FR-FR 為 JA-JP。It changes the current thread culture from en-US to fr-FR to ja-JP. 並在每個情況下呼叫方法，以傳回使用該文化特性的日期和時間值的字串表示。and in each case calls the method to return the string representation of a date and time value using that culture. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#1)]

System.Security.SecuritySafeCritical

param.name: provider
param.span: 物件，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

span.span: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的特定文化特性格式資訊，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific format information.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 所指定。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的值物件的格式會使用一般的日期和時間格式規範 ('G') 的格式化輸出使用簡短日期模式和完整時間模式。The value of the current object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'), which formats output using the short date pattern and the long time pattern. 簡短日期和完整時間模式的格式由所定義`provider`參數。The format of the short date and long time pattern is defined by the `provider` parameter. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則會使用目前文化特性相關聯的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object associated with the current culture is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示日期和時間使用的字串表示代表五個不同的文化特性的物件。The following example displays the string representation of a date and time using objects that represent five different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString4.vb#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Security.SecuritySafeCritical

param.name: format
param.span: 標準或自訂的日期和時間格式字串。

span.span: A standard or custom date and time format string.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式和目前文化特性的格式化慣例，將目前 物件的值轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and the formatting conventions of the current culture.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 所指定。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回使用目前文化特性; 如需詳細資訊的格式化慣例的特定格式的日期和時間值的字串表示，請參閱。The method returns the string representation of a date and time value in a specific format that uses the formatting conventions of the current culture; for more information, see . `format`參數應該包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱 < [ 標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，定義傳回之字串的格式。The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string. 如果`format`是`null`或是空字串，一般格式規範，而 'G'，會使用。If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the general format specifier, 'G', is used. 這個方法的部分用法包括：Some uses of this method include: - 取得字串中目前的文化特性的簡短日期和時間格式顯示日期和時間。Getting a string that displays the date and time in the current culture's short date and time format. 若要這樣做，您可以使用"G"格式規範。To do this, you use the "G" format specifier. - 取得字串，包含只在月份和年份。Getting a string that contains only the month and year. 若要這樣做，您可以使用"MM/yyyy"格式字串。To do this, you use the "MM/yyyy" format string. 格式字串會使用目前文化特性的日期分隔符號。The format string uses the current culture's date separator. - 取得字串，包含以特定格式的時間與日期。Getting a string that contains the date and time in a specific format. 比方說，「 MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm"格式字串會顯示日期和時間字串的固定格式如"19 / 03 / / 2013年 18:06"。For example, the "MM/dd/yyyyHH:mm" format string displays the date and time string in a fixed format such as "19//03//2013 18:06". 格式字串會使用"/"做為固定的日期分隔符號，不論特定文化特性設定為何。The format string uses "/" as a fixed date separator regardless of culture-specific settings. - 取得壓縮格式的日期，可用於序列化的日期字串。Getting a date in a condensed format that could be used for serializing a date string. 例如，"yyyyMMdd"格式字串會顯示且沒有日期分隔符號後面兩位數月份和兩位數天數的四位數年份。For example, the "yyyyMMdd" format string displays a four-digit year followed by a two-digit month and a two-digit day with no date separator. 下列範例會使用這三個格式字串來顯示日期和時間值所使用之 EN-US 和 FR-FR 文化特性的慣例。The following example uses these three format strings to display a date and time value by using the conventions of the en-US and fr-FR cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring5.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列範例使用每個標準日期和時間格式字串和選取的自訂日期和時間格式字串來顯示的字串表示值。The following example uses each of the standard date and time format strings and a selection of custom date and time format strings to display the string representation of a value. 此範例的執行緒目前文化特性是 EN-US。The thread current culture for the example is en-US. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/ToString2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/ToString2.vb#2)]

para.span: 下列範例提供一個實例。

summary.span: 使用指定的格式和特定文化特性的格式資訊，將目前 物件的值，轉換為其相等的字串表示。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and culture-specific format information.

returns.span: 目前 物件值的字串表示，如 及 所指定。

span.span: A string representation of value of the current object as specified by and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`參數可以包含單一格式規範字元 (請參閱 < [ 標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自訂格式模式 (請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))。The `format` parameter can contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). 如果`format`是`null`或空字串 ("")，會使用的標準格式規範，"G"、。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the standard format specifier, "G", is used. `provider`參數定義的模式，對應至標準格式規範，以及符號和日期和時間元件的名稱。The `provider` parameter defines the pattern that corresponds to the standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示要在傳回的字串會反映其格式設定慣例的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義傳回之字串的格式。The object returned by the property defines the formatting of the returned string. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂物件實作介面。A custom object that implements the interface. 其方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。Its method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則聯目前會使用文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the associated with the current culture is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用每個標準日期時間格式字串來顯示日期和時間的四個不同的文化特性的字串表示。The following example uses each of the standard date time format strings to display the string representation of a date and time for four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/cs/tostring3.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.ToString/vb/tostring3.vb#4)] 下列範例會示範不同方式來格式化值使用恆定性。The following example demonstrates different ways of formatting a value using the invariant . [!code-cpp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DateTime.ToString2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic DateTime.ToString2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Function ToUniversalTime () As DateTime
