member this.ToUniversalTime : unit -> DateTime

summary.span: 將目前 物件的值轉換成國際標準時間 (UTC)。

span.span: Converts the value of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

returns.span: 物件，其 屬性為 ，而其值為與目前 物件的值相等的 UTC 時間；如果轉換過的值太大，而無法由 物件表示，則為 ；如果轉換過的值太小，而無法表示為 物件，則為 。

span.span: An object whose property is , and whose value is the UTC equivalent to the value of the current object, or if the converted value is too large to be represented by a object, or if the converted value is too small to be represented by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 是相等的當地時間減去 UTC 時差。The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) is equal to the local time minus the UTC offset. 如需 UTC 時差的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the UTC offset, see . 轉換也會納入考慮日光節約時間規則套用至目前所表示之時間物件。The conversion also takes into account the daylight saving time rule that applies to the time represented by the current object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法會從當地時間轉換為 UTC 時，會辨識只在目前的調整規則。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when converting from local time to UTC. 如此一來，轉換為目前的調整規則生效之前的期間，可能不會正確反映當地時間與 UTC 之間的差異。As a result, conversions for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect may not accurately reflect the difference between local time and UTC. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，所傳回的值開始取決於方法屬性與目前物件。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the value returned by the method is determined by the property of the current object. 下表說明可能的結果。The following table describes the possible results. |類型Kind|結果Results| |----------|-------------| ||不會執行轉換。No conversion is performed.| ||目前物件轉換為 UTC。The current object is converted to UTC.| ||目前物件會被假設為本地時間，並執行轉換作業一樣已。The current object is assumed to be a local time, and the conversion is performed as if were .| > [!NOTE] > 方法將UTC 到本地時間的值。The method converts a value from local time to UTC. 若要在非當地時區與 UTC 轉換時，使用方法。To convert the time in a non-local time zone to UTC, use the method. 若要轉換其與 UTC 的位移已知的時間，使用方法。To convert a time whose offset from UTC is known, use the method. 如果日期和時間的執行個體值是模稜兩可的時間，此方法會假設它是標準時間。If the date and time instance value is an ambiguous time, this method assumes that it is a standard time. （模稜兩可的時間會是一個可對應至標準時間或以當地時區的日光節約時間）如果日期和時間的執行個體值是無效的時間，這個方法只會減去當地時間，以傳回 UTC 位移的當地時區的 utc。(An ambiguous time is one that can map either to a standard time or to a daylight saving time in the local time zone) If the date and time instance value is an invalid time, this method simply subtracts the local time from the local time zone's UTC offset to return UTC. （無效的時間是其中一個因日光節約時間調整規則的應用程式而不存在）。(An invalid time is one that does not exist because of the application of daylight saving time adjustment rules.) ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.ToLocalTime ToUniversalTime/VB/class1.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. [!code-csharp[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/cs/ks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTime.Kind_Suite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DateTime.Kind_Suite/vb/ks.vb#1)]

para.span: 方法有時候用來將當地時間轉換成 UTC。

span.span: The method is sometimes used to convert a local time to UTC.

para.span: 還原原始的本機時間，然後呼叫方法。

span.span: The method is then called to restore the original local time.

para.span: 不過，如果原始時間代表不正確的時間以當地時區，兩個的當地時間值不會相等。

span.span: However, if the original time represents an invalid time in the local time zone, the two local time values will not be equal.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱方法。

span.span: For additional information and an example, see the method.

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系統方法能夠辨識只有目前的調整規則當地時區，它只適用於所有的日期，包括舊版日期 （也就是日期早於目前的調整的開始日期規則）。

span.span: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method recognizes only the current adjustment rule for the local time zone, which it applies to all dates, including down-level dates (that is, dates that are earlier than the starting date of the current adjustment rule).

para.span: 在上執行的應用程式[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，您需要在過去精確的本地日期和時間計算時，必須暫時解決此問題上，使用方法來擷取物件，其對應於當地時區，並呼叫其方法。

span.span: Applications running on [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] that require historically accurate local date and time calculations must work around this behavior by using the method to retrieve a object that corresponds to the local time zone and calling its method.

para.span: 下列範例說明之間的差異並上的方法[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]美國。

span.span: The following example illustrates the difference between the and methods on a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] system in the U.S. Pacific Time zone.

para.span: 第一次的兩個方法呼叫為 2006 年的日期套用目前的時區調整規則 （這已生效，2007）。

span.span: The first two method calls apply the current time zone adjustment rule (which went into effect in 2007) to a date in 2006.

para.span: 目前的調整規則提供轉換到日光節約時間的年 3 月; 第二個星期日上一個規則，已在作用中，在 2006 中，供轉換到日光節約時間於 4 月的第一個星期日發生。

span.span: The current adjustment rule provides for the transition to daylight saving time on the second Sunday of March; the previous rule, which was in effect in 2006, provided for the transition to daylight saving time to occur on the first Sunday of April.

para.span: 此歷程記錄的日期和時間轉換，準確地會執行第三個方法呼叫。

span.span: Only the third method call accurately performs this historical date and time conversion.

param.span: 如果轉換成功，這個方法會傳回包含與 中內含之日期與時間相等的 值；如果轉換失敗，則為 。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the value equivalent to the date and time contained in , if the conversion succeeded, or if the conversion failed.

param.span: 如果 參數為 、為空字串 ("") 或者不包含日期和時間的有效字串表示，則轉換會失敗。

span.span: The conversion fails if the parameter is , is an empty string (""), or does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

summary.span: 將日期和時間的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 ，並傳回一個值表示轉換是否成功。

returns.span: 如果 參數轉換成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是類似方法，不同之處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 字串`s`剖析目前使用之格式資訊由目前執行緒文化特性隱含提供的物件。The string `s` is parsed using formatting information in the current object, which is supplied implicitly by the current thread culture. 可能的話，這個方法會嘗試將忽略無法辨識的資料，並填入遺漏的月、 日和年資訊使用目前的日期。This method tries to ignore unrecognized data, if possible, and fills in missing month, day, and year information with the current date. 如果`s`包含只有日期而沒有時間中，此方法會假設時間為午夜 12:00。If `s` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes the time is 12:00 midnight. 如果`s`包含的日期元件含有兩位數年份，則會轉換成目前的文化特性的現行曆法的值中之年屬性。If `s` includes a date component with a two-digit year, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 前置、 內部或結尾中的空白字元`s`會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space character in `s` is ignored. 日期和時間可以是一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （' #'，U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 因為方法會嘗試剖析日期字串表示，而且使用目前的文化特性，並嘗試將特定的字串剖析跨不同的文化特性的格式化規則的時間可能會失敗或傳回不同的結果。Because the method tries to parse the string representation of a date and time using the formatting rules of the current culture, trying to parse a particular string across different cultures can either fail or return different results. 如果會剖析特定日期和時間格式，在不同的地區設定，使用方法或其中一個多載方法，並提供格式規範。If a specific date and time format will be parsed across different locales, use the method or one of the overloads of the method and provide a format specifier. 如果`s`閏年中為閏日，在現行曆法，也就是方法剖析的字串表示法`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`在目前文化特性的現行曆法為閏日在非-閏年的字串表示法，剖析作業失敗，而且此方法會傳回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current culture's current calendar, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，`result`包含值屬性是方法傳回時。If `s` contains no time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. 如果要剖析的字串包含時區資訊，請`result`包含值屬性是方法傳回時。If the string to be parsed contains time zone information, `result` contains a value whose property is when the method returns. ## Examples 下列範例會將傳遞的日期和時間字串數目方法。The following example passes a number of date and time strings to the method. [!code-cpp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cpp/datetime.tryparse1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)]

span.span: Formatting is influenced by properties of the current object, which by default are derived from the **Regional and Language Options** item in Control Panel.

para.span: 方法可以意外失敗，並傳回如果目前和屬性會設為相同的值。

span.span: The method can unexpectedly fail and return if the current and properties are set to the same value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法剖析字串可包含日期、 時間和時區資訊。The method parses a string that can contain date, time, and time zone information. 類似於方法，不同之處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 這個方法會嘗試將忽略無法辨識的資料，以及剖析`s`完全。This method attempts to ignore unrecognized data and parse `s` completely. 如果`s`包含一次，但不含日期，則該方法的預設值取代目前的日期或，如果`styles`包含旗標，它會替代`DateTime.Date.MinValue`。If `s` contains a time but no date, the method by default substitutes the current date or, if `styles` includes the flag, it substitutes `DateTime.Date.MinValue`. 如果`s`包含日期，但沒有時間，12:00 午夜做為預設的時間。If `s` contains a date but no time, 12:00 midnight is used as the default time. 如果日期存在，但是它的年份元件只有兩位數所組成，它會轉換成中之年`provider`參數的現行曆法為基礎的值屬性。If a date is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 前置、 內部或結尾中的空白字元`s`都會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white space characters in `s` are ignored. 日期和時間可以是一組的開頭和尾端數字符號字元 （' #'，U + 0023），而且必須尾隨一或多個 NULL 字元 (U + 0000)。The date and time can be bracketed with a pair of leading and trailing NUMBER SIGN characters ('#', U+0023), and can be trailed with one or more NULL characters (U+0000). 藉由定義特定的有效格式的日期和時間項目，以及名稱以及在日期和時間、 使用符號`provider`參數，它可以是下列任一項：Specific valid formats for date and time elements, as well as the names and symbols used in dates and times, are defined by the `provider` parameter, which can be any of the following: - A物件，表示其格式設定中使用的文化特性`s`參數。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `s` parameter. 所傳回的物件屬性會定義所使用的格式`s`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `s`. - A物件，定義所使用的格式`s`。A object that defines the formatting used in `s`. - 自訂 實作。A custom implementation. 其方法會傳回物件，定義所使用的格式`s`。Its method returns a object that defines the formatting used in `s`. 如果 `provider` 是 `null`，則會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the current culture is used. 如果`s`閏年中為閏日，在現行曆法，也就是方法剖析的字串表示法`s`成功。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a leap year in the current calendar, the method parses `s` successfully. 如果`s`中的現行曆法為閏日在非-閏年的字串表示法`provider`剖析作業失敗，則方法會傳回`false`。If `s` is the string representation of a leap day in a non-leap year in the current calendar of `provider`, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. `styles`參數會定義精確的解譯剖析的字串和剖析作業應該如何處理它。The `styles` parameter defines the precise interpretation of the parsed string and how the parse operation should handle it. 它可以是一個或多個成員列舉型別下, 表中所述。It can be one or more members of the enumeration, as described in the following table. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||剖析`s`而且，如果有需要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含時區時差，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，這個方法會剖析字串，呼叫轉換傳回值為 UTC並設定屬性設。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 中的日期和時間項目可以使用內部空白字元`s`。Inner white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 中的日期和時間項目可以使用前置空白字元`s`。Leading white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored. 尾端空白字元的日期和時間項目中允許`s`。Trailing white space is permitted in the date and time elements of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端空白字元。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior. 它不能覆寫透過提供更具限制性列舉值，例如。It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive enumeration value such as .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表當地時間。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||雖然有效，但會忽略此值。Although valid, this value is ignored.| ||針對包含時區資訊的字串，會嘗試防止日期和時間字串轉換成具有值及其屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion of a date and time string to a value with its property set to . 一般而言，這類字串由呼叫方法使用"o"、"r"或"u"標準格式規範。Typically, such a string is created by calling the method using either the "o", "r", or "u" standard format specifiers.| 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，方法會傳回值屬性除非`styles`旗標表示其他。If `s` contains no time zone information, the method returns a value whose property is unless a `styles` flag indicates otherwise. 如果`s`時區位移的資訊，包括方法會執行任何所需的時間轉換，並傳回下列其中之一：If `s` includes time zone or time zone offset information, the method performs any necessary time conversion and returns one of the following: - A值的日期和時間會反映當地時間，且其屬性是。A value whose date and time reflect the local time and whose property is . - 或者，如果`styles`包含旗標值的日期和時間會反映 UTC，且其屬性是。Or, if `styles` includes the flag, a value whose date and time reflect UTC and whose property is . 使用覆寫這個行為旗標。This behavior can be overridden by using the flag. ## 剖析的自訂文化特性Parsing Custom Cultures 如果您剖析產生自訂的文化特性的日期和時間字串，使用方法，而非方法，以改善剖析作業會成功的機率。If you parse a date and time string generated for a custom culture, use the method instead of the method to improve the probability that the parse operation will succeed. 自訂文化特性的日期和時間字串可以是複雜且很難剖析。A custom culture date and time string can be complicated and difficult to parse. 方法會嘗試剖析的字串與數個隱含的剖析模式，其中都可能會失敗。The method attempts to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail. 相反地，方法需要您明確地指定一或多個實際的剖析模式可能會成功。In contrast, the method requires you to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed. 如需有關自訂文化特性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about custom cultures, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例說明方法。The following example illustrates the method. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/cs/tryparse2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.TryParse#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.TryParse/vb/tryparse2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析所定義的格式必須是日期的字串表示`format`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 類似於方法，不同之處在於方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is similar to the method, except that the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間，而且所定義的格式必須是`format`參數。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse and must be in a format defined by the `format` parameter. 如果日期、 時間和時區元素存在於`s`，也必須在所指定的順序出現`format`。If date, time, and time zone elements are present in `s`, they must also appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`format`定義日期使用任何時間元素，而剖析作業成功時，所產生的值具有午夜的時間 (00: 00:00)。If `format` defines a date with no time element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value has a time of midnight (00:00:00). 如果`format`所定義的時間與沒有任何日期項目，而剖析作業成功時，所產生的預設值具有的日期`DateTime.Now.Date`，或它有日期`DateTime.MinValue.Date`如果`styles`包含旗標。If `format` defines a time with no date element and the parse operation succeeds, the resulting value by default has a date of `DateTime.Now.Date`, or it has a date of `DateTime.MinValue.Date` if `styles` includes the flag. `style`參數會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置字元、 內部或結尾的空白字元。The `style` parameter determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 使用也可以變更此行為旗標，就會傳回值屬性是，或使用並旗標，以傳回值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如有必要，如果 s 包含時區資訊，將時間會轉換為當地時間，而屬性傳回之物件設定為。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 使用也可以變更此行為無法轉換為當地時間的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，並設定的旗標屬性設。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `format`參數會包含對應至預期的格式模式`s`參數。The `format` parameter contains a pattern that corresponds to the expected format of the `s` parameter. 中的模式`format`參數是由從一或多個自訂格式規範所組成[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或從識別為預先定義的模式，單一標準格式規範[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。The pattern in the `format` parameter consists of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您不使用日期或時間分隔符號的自訂格式模式中，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和廣泛形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要在模式中指定的時數，指定更多表單中，"HH"，而非較窄的表單，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". > [!NOTE] > 不需要可`s`符合單一格式的剖析作業成功，您可以呼叫方法並指定多個允許的格式。Rather than requiring that `s` conform to a single format for the parse operation to succeed, you can call the method and specify multiple permitted formats. 這可讓剖析作業更容易成功。This makes the parse operation more likely to succeed. 特定日期和時間的符號和中使用的字串 （例如在特定的語言中一周天數名稱）`s`所定義`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式指定名稱的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示用來解譯的文化特性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 所傳回的物件及其屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂實作其方法會傳回物件或提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員列舉型別，判斷是否與其中所未定義泛空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制的剖析作業精確的行為。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述每個方式的成員列舉型別會影響營運方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||剖析`s`而且，如果有需要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `s` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 如果`s`包含時區時差，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，這個方法會剖析字串，呼叫轉換傳回值為 UTC並設定屬性設。If `s` includes a time zone offset, or if `s` contains no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, performs no time zone conversion on the returned value, and sets the property to . 在其他情況下，此旗標會有任何作用。In all other cases, the flag has no effect.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`任何個別的日期或時間項目之間可以出現。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear between any individual date or time element.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在開頭`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the beginning of `s`.| ||指定未定義的泛空白字元`format`可以出現在結尾`s`。Specifies that white space not defined by `format` can appear at the end of `s`.| ||指定`s`可能包含前置、 內部和尾端未定義的泛空白字元`format`。Specifies that `s` may contain leading, inner, and trailing white spaces not defined by `format`.| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表當地時間。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含時間的日期，傳回的值設定為不含日期資訊`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`會剖析參數，使用預設值。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 非出示中沒有空白字元`format`允許。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，值設為 1/1/0001。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 時區資訊是否存在於`s`，時間會轉換為當地時間與屬性傳回的物件設定為。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| ||針對包含時區資訊的字串，會嘗試防止轉換成具有值及其屬性設定為。For strings that contain time zone information, tries to prevent the conversion to a value with its property set to . 主要，此旗標可避免 UTC 時間的轉換為本地時間。This flag primarily prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 請注意，字串"2009 年 5 月 01 日上午 8:30"無法成功剖析時`styles`參數等於因為所不允許有前置空格`format`。Note that the string " 5/01/2009 8:30 AM" cannot be parsed successfully when the `styles` parameter equals because leading spaces are not allowed by `format`. 此外，字串"2009 年 5 月 01 日 09:00"無法以成功地剖析`format`的"MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm"因為日期字串前面沒有前置的零，月份數字為`format`需要。Additionally, the string "5/01/2009 09:00" cannot be parsed successfully with a `format` of "MM/dd/yyyyhh:mm" because the date string does not precede the month number with a leading zero, as `format` requires. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析的日期字串表示符合任何一個模式指派給`formats`參數。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 就像方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。It is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. `s`參數包含要剖析的日期和時間。The `s` parameter contains the date and time to parse. 如果`s`參數會包含只有一次，而且沒有日期，目前的日期是除非`style`參數包含旗標，在此情況下的預設日期 (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a time and no date, the current date is used unless the `style` parameter includes the flag, in which case the default date (`DateTime.Date.MinValue`) is used. 如果`s`參數會包含只有日期任何時間、 午夜 (00: 00:00) 使用。If the `s` parameter contains only a date and no time, midnight (00:00:00) is used. `style`參數也會決定是否`s`參數可以包含前置字元、 內部或結尾的空白字元以外的其中一個格式字串中允許的字元`formats`。The `style` parameter also determines whether the `s` parameter can contain leading, inner, or trailing white space characters other than those permitted by one of the format strings in `formats`. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is . 使用也可以變更此行為旗標，就會傳回值屬性是，或使用並旗標，以傳回值屬性是。This behavior can be changed by using the flag, which returns a value whose property is , or by using the and flags, which returns a value whose property is . 如有必要，如果 s 包含時區資訊，將時間會轉換為當地時間，而屬性傳回之物件設定為。If s contains time zone information, the time is converted to local time, if necessary, and the property of the returned object is set to . 使用也可以變更此行為無法轉換為當地時間的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，並設定的旗標屬性設。This behavior can be changed by using the flag to not convert Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to a local time and set the property to . `formats`參數包含陣列的模式，其中`s`必須完全符合剖析作業會成功。The `formats` parameter contains an array of patterns, one of which `s` must match exactly if the parse operation is to succeed. 中的模式`formats`參數所組成的一或多個自訂格式規範[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表或從識別為預先定義的模式，單一標準格式規範[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)資料表。The patterns in the `formats` parameter consist of one or more custom format specifiers from the [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table, or a single standard format specifier, which identifies a predefined pattern, from the [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) table. 如果您不使用日期或時間分隔符號的自訂格式模式中，使用的文化特性而異`provider`參數和廣泛形式的每個自訂格式規範。If you do not use date or time separators in a custom format pattern, use the invariant culture for the `provider` parameter and the widest form of each custom format specifier. 例如，如果您想要在模式中指定的時數，指定更多表單中，"HH"，而非較窄的表單，"H"。For example, if you want to specify hours in the pattern, specify the wider form, "HH", instead of the narrower form, "H". 特定日期和時間的符號和中使用的字串 （例如在特定的語言中一周天數名稱）`s`所定義`provider`參數，因為是精確的格式`s`如果`format`是標準格式指定名稱的字串。The particular date and time symbols and strings (such as the names of the days of the week in a particular language) used in `s` are defined by the `provider` parameter, as is the precise format of `s` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `provider`參數可以是下列任一項：The `provider` parameter can be any of the following: - A物件，表示用來解譯的文化特性`s`。A object that represents the culture used to interpret `s`. 所傳回的物件及其屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`s`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `s`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. - 自訂實作其方法會傳回物件或提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom implementation whose method returns either the object or the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數包含一個或多個成員列舉型別，判斷是否與其中所未定義泛空白字元`format`可以出現在`s`及控制的剖析作業精確的行為。The `styles` parameter includes one or more members of the enumeration that determine whether and where white space not defined by `format` can appear in `s` and that control the precise behavior of the parse operation. 下表描述每個方式的成員列舉型別會影響營運方法。The following table describes how each member of the enumeration affects the operation of the method. |DateTimeStyles 成員DateTimeStyles member|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| no time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses the string, calls to convert the returned value to UTC, and sets the property to . 如果`s`表示它代表 UTC，或者如果`s`不包含時區資訊，但`styles`包括旗標，方法剖析字串，會執行任何時區轉換對傳回值，並設定屬性設。If `s` indicates that it represents UTC, or if `s` does not contain time zone information but `styles` includes the flag, the method parses information, it is assumed to represent a local time. 除非旗標已存在，屬性傳回的值設定為。Unless the flag is present, the property of the returned value is set to .| ||指定當`s`缺少任何時區的資訊，它會假設為代表 UTC。Specifies that if `s` lacks any time zone information, it is assumed to represent UTC. 除非旗標存在，則方法會將轉換傳回值與 UTC 於當地時間和設定其屬性設。Unless the flag is present, the method converts the returned value from UTC to local time and sets its property to .| ||如果`s`包含時間的日期，傳回的值設定為不含日期資訊`DateTime.MinValue.Date`。If `s` contains time without date information, the date of the return value is set to `DateTime.MinValue.Date`.| ||`s`會剖析參數，使用預設值。The `s` parameter is parsed using default values. 非出示中沒有空白字元`format`允許。No white space other than that present in `format` is allowed. 如果`s`缺少傳回之日期的日期元件，值設為 1/1/0001。If `s` lacks a date component, the date of the returned value is set to 1/1/0001. 如果`s`不包含時區資訊，屬性傳回的物件設定為。If `s` contains no time zone information, the property of the returned object is set to . 時區資訊是否存在於`s`，時間會轉換為當地時間與屬性傳回的物件設定為。If time zone information is present in `s`, the time is converted to local time and the property of the returned object is set to .| prevents the conversion of UTC times to local times.| ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以確保可成功剖析在幾個可能的格式的字串。The following example uses the method to ensure that a string in a number of possible formats can be remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的解析取決於系統計時器，這取決於基礎作業系統。The resolution of this property depends on the system timer, which depends on the underlying operating system. 它通常是介於 0.5 至 15 毫秒。It tends to be between 0.5 and 15 milliseconds. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，傳回值是其屬性會傳回。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the return value is a whose property returns . 使用替代是。An alternative to using is . 雖然先前表示的日期和時間值，指派為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)至其屬性，後者會將指派日期和時間值的 UTC 時間的時差 (等於)。While the former indicates that a date and time value is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by assigning to its property, the latter assigns the date and time value the UTC time's offset (equal to ). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，示範如何屬性會影響和轉換方法。The following example uses the method to demonstrate how the property influences the and conversion methods. span.span: The year, between 1 and 9999.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回西曆中的目前執行個體的年份。The property returns the year of the current instance in the Gregorian calendar. 它不會傳回使用目前的文化特性的預設曆法的年份。It does not return the year using the default calendar of the current culture. 若要擷取使用特定曆法的年份，您可以呼叫該行事曆`GetYear`方法，如下列程式碼所示。To retrieve the year using a particular calendar, you can call that calendar's `GetYear` method, as the following code shows. [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Year#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Year/cs/Year.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Year#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Year/vb/Year.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列範例示範屬性。The following example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[System.DateTime.Minute etc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Minute etc/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.DateTime.Minute etc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Minute etc/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTime.Minute etc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTime.Minute etc/VB/class1.vb#1)]
